channel.title: Haken continuum interface via USB
channel.description:
[quote="thetechnobear, post:1, topic:19"] Capabilities: class compliant usb device, receiving note, pitchbend, pressure and cc data.Current limitations: Data can only be sent from host (e.g. computer) to axoloti, not from axoloti to host: [/quote]
Any plans to make the axoloti able to send midi through the USB port? I'm thinking of developing a way to control my continuum via MIDI and developing using the midi through the USB would be great.. It would also be a nice kickass midi controller w/ the joystick/buttons/etc shield..

item.title: Haken continuum interface via USB
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Ive moved this to a new topic, as the other thread is purely for reporting if controllers work or not, not discussion.
(its already 146 posts, so not good a good place for discussion )

bafonso:

Oh, wonderful. I was surprised. So what exactly does not work?

honestly, I cant remember, I wrote that when Axo has only just been released (nearly 2 years ago), I suspect its wrong/badly worded - I'll correct it, once ive double checked it with an axo board.

EDIT: ok, tested, as I suspected, its fine - so Ive updated original post.
(re-reading it, I wonder if perhaps its was a limitation in the original firmware, that's now been fixed... anyways works now :))

Read full topic

item.title: Haken continuum interface via USB
item.dc:creator: @bafonso
item.description:
@bafonso wrote:

Oh that looks great! My idea was to simply tweak parameters and also have midi LFO for parameters

Read full topic

item.title: Haken continuum interface via USB
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

Can you develop on your idea @bafonso ? Axoloti>Continuum

Its easy to use axoloti+axocontrol along the Haken Continuum
This is from last SuperBooth were I spend all morning having great fun, showing possibilities.

Anyone going to Sooperbooth?

[image] All Saturday morning having fun with Axoloti+Axocontrol and Continuum; MPE patches, EFX, simple, preset bank change; forgot to take more photos this one was already with almost everything unplugged...

Read full topic

item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

It already does send midi thru USB, what do you exactly want that it doesn't do already?

item.title: Haken continuum interface via USB
item.dc:creator: @bafonso
item.description:
@bafonso wrote:

thetechnobear:

Capabilities: class compliant usb device, receiving note, pitchbend, pressure and cc data.Current limitations: Data can only be sent from host (e.g. computer) to axoloti, not from axoloti to host:

Any plans to make the axoloti able to send midi through the USB port? I'm thinking of developing a way to control my continuum via MIDI and developing using the midi through the USB would be great.. It would also be a nice kickass midi controller w/ the joystick/buttons/etc shield..
